mapper.select: SELECT mebrNo, id, name, alias, birth, pwd, phone1, phone2, phone3, acct, status, grade, regDate, frsidNmbr, modifyDate, lstidNmbr, etc FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (id, name, alias, birth, pwd, phone1, phone2, phone3, acct, status, grade, regDate, frsidNmbr, modifyDate, lstidNmbr, etc) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{alias}, #{birth}, #{pwd}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{acct}, #{status}, #{grade}, #{regDate}, #{frsidNmbr}, #{modifyDate}, #{lstidNmbr}, #{etc})
